sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Popup } from "react-leaflet"; import { FlightData } from "./FlightDataProvider"; const FlightInfo = ({ flight }) => { console.log("flight", flight); const { time, ...FlightInfo } = useContext(FlightData); return (
Flight Info
{flight.carrierCode}-{flight.flightNo}/{flight.departureStation}- {flight.arrivalStation}
UTC:{time}
FLIGHT NO:
{flight.flightNo}
DEPARTURE STATION
{flight.departureStation}
SCHEDULED
{flight.scheduledDeparture}
ACTUAL
{flight.actualDeparture}
ARRIVAL STATION
{flight.arrivalStation}
SCHEDULED
{flight.scheduledArrival}
ESTIMATED
{flight.scheduledArrival}
AIRCRAFT TYPE:
{flight.aircraftType}
REG
{flight.registration}
); }; export default FlightInfo;
